title: PML-Z’s Ghulam Murtaza wins PP-241
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 09 (APP): Pakistan Muslim League-Zia-ul-Haq Shaheed’s (PML-Z), Ghulam Murtaza won the Punjab Assembly election from PP-241 constituency Bahawalnagar-V by securing 58,399 votes.
According to the unofficial result issued by the Returning Officer/ECP, his runner-up was Chaudhry Mazhar Iqbal of Pakistan Muslim League-Nawaz (PML-N) who bagged 35,130 votes.
Voters’ turn-out remained at 57.24 per cent.
